title: T206 Cobb and Young for trade
author: Tex

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb and Young for trade
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to swap Cobb-for-Cobb or Young-for-Young as follows...

Available:
T206 Cobb (green) Piedmont SCG 10
T206 Young (glove) Sweet Carporal SGC 10

For:
T206 Cobb (red) any back
T206 Young (portrait) any back

In terms of condition, I just like a clean picture so pinholes and corner creases are welcome.  Willing to pay a little cash difference, but please no offers for notably higher grade cards.  [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/jared.harrington/BaseballCards#"]Hi-res photos can be found here[/URL].  Email [url]jarharrington@yahoo.com[/url].  Thanks!
